ForeignActivitiesQuestions.Question: Do you have any foreign property, business connections, or financial interests?
Are you now or have you ever been employed by or acted as a consultant for a foreign government, firm, or agency?

Have you ever had any contact with a foreign government, its establishments (embassies or consulates), or its representatives, whether inside or outside the U.S., other than on official U.S. Government business? (Does not include routine visa applications and border crossing contacts.)
In the last 7 years have you had an active passport that was issued by a foreign government?
